Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup

Class TestRSGroupsWithACL

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.access.SecureTestUtil
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup.TestRSGroupsWithACL
public class TestRSGroupsWithACL extends SecureTestUtil
Performs authorization checks for rsgroup operations, according to different levels of authorized users.
